review: I LOVE IT!!! My TV and Blu-Ray player were incompatible with the Showtime feature on Hulu, so I thought I'd give Amazon Fire TV a try. I'm so pleased by how easy it is to use. It's just wonderful!
author: Sharon Compton

review: Great product lots of good programs
author: antonio sarra

review: It was what I was looking for just enjoying it.

review: less than 1 star ---just after the one year warranty ended it starts having problems and I have to reboot the entire system each time I try to use it!!!!
author: CG

review: Very pleased with the ease of use.
author: Divergal

review: Have no idea what button to push. No Manual.

review: I am very happy with my Amazon Fire. What a great addition to my antenna system.
